disclaimer_addvertisement: Now, access all Tamil Nadu Government Services at the comfort of your home
quote_1_1: I'll serve my people, for the one who so said.
quote_1_2: God shall grid up his robes and rush to his aid.
quote_2: Even the power of nature, which is said to be the act of God, will help him who works tirelessly to uplift his fellow citizens.
registration_text: Please do not press refresh or back button before registration is completed
profile_modal_body: Filling all mandatory information will help you and your family members find schemes you are eligible for.
about_content: SFDB - Makkal Portal will provide all TN state residents/beneficiaries a single window access to the demographic data available across the all-department databases. The citizens can view their Demographic details (personal information, address, family details and contact information), eligible schemes, enrolled schemes, availed benefits from various schemes, availed e-sevai services, registered Muthalvarin Mugavari track requests registered track service requests in Makkal portal. This portal allows the residents to make changes to their personal information after due Aadhaar authentication.
department_address_modal_text: Are you sure you want to update the address with
info_mandatory: Fields marked with * are mandatory
landing_profile_update_card_desc: View / Update Tamil Nadu resident individual details
landing_cmHelpline_card_desc: Know the status of CM helpline requests
landing_schemeEligibility_card_desc: Discover Tamil Nadu government schemes by search through your basic details
landing_nambikkai_card_desc: #Nambikkai Inaiyam is TN government blockchain policy and backbone where people can secure thier datas in #Blockchain.
about_makkal_portal_desc: Makkal Portal will allow the resident of Tamil Nadu to view their personal information available in various department/beneficiary databases. Using Aadhar based authentication, the residents can make changes to their personal information, update residential address in SFDB and upload the supporting documents for the changes.
about_tnega_desc: Tamil Nadu e-Governance Agency works towards fulfilling the Government of Tamil Nadu’s vision of Good Governance using IT tools. TNeGA’s endeavour is to make working within the government transparent, efficient, and also to provide quick and efficient delivery of online services to people. TNeGA also aims to make full use of new, emerging, and sophisticated technologies like Blockchain, AI/ML, IoT, Drones, Data Analytics and AR/VR/MR.

integrated_beneficiary_view_desc: This enables the public to know the details of the beneficiaries of the welfare schemes offered by different departments.
